its_value_for: Supports; harmonize; projects empathy; it is service oriented.
more_effective_if: Become more aware of who you are and what you can do; show more firmness and aggressiveness; say "no" at the right times.

The Agent is interested in both human relationships and various aspects of the job. Thanks to his empathy and tolerance, he knows how to listen and is known for his good disposition. The Agent makes others feel that they are loved and needed. There is no one who is afraid of being rejected by an Agent. What's more, the agent is friendly and willing to help.

Regarding work, the Agent has excellent potential for organization and efficient execution. He is excellent at doing for others what they find difficult to do. The Agent naturally seeks harmony and cooperation in the group.

However, the Agent fears conflict and disagreement. Your tendency to help may urge others to tolerate a situation rather than seek a solution to the problem. Furthermore, the Agent's tendency to adopt a "low" profile rather than accept a frank confrontation with aggressive people, which can be seen as a lack of "toughness". Despite everything, the Agent has a good level of independence although he is concerned about his integration into the group.
under_pressure: He becomes persuasive by making use, if necessary, of information he possesses or of key friends.
